questions.question: This arc revolves around Luffy and his crew's involvement in a massive conflict against Kaido and his forces. What is...?
This arc is the first in the series and introduces Monkey D. Luffy and his aspiration to become the Pirate King. What is...?
This arc showcases the history of Sanji and the power struggle within the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
This ability, used by a notorious pirate, grants the power to produce and control mochi. What is...?
This technique allows its user to multiply their limbs and heads, as seen used by a certain Marine officer. What is...?
This ability is a special Paramecia type Devil Fruit that allows the user to interact with the soul and lifespan of themselves and others. What is...?
This member of the Worst Generation, known for their 'Room' ability and Ope Ope no Mi Devil Fruit, is a notorious pirate and surgeon. Who is...?
This character, often seen with a pinwheel hat, is the adoptive older brother of a Straw Hat crew member and was once a member of the Sun Pirates. Who is...?
This character, a member of the Straw Hat Pirates and a skilled archaeologist, is known for her ability to read Poneglyphs. Who is...?
